verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> unto my Lord <S%H113><s%>, Sit <S%H3427><s%> thou at my right hand <S%H3225><s%>, Until I make <S%H7896><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> thy footstool <S%H1916><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> forth the rod <S%H4294><s%> of thy strength <S%H5797><s%> out of Zion <S%H6726><s%>: Rule <S%H7287><s%> thou in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thine enemies <S%H341><s%>.

Thy people <S%H5971><s%> offer themselves willingly <S%H5071><s%> In the day <S%H3117><s%> of thy power <S%H2428><s%>, in holy <S%H6944><s%> array <S%H1926><s%>: Out of the womb <S%H7358><s%> of the morning <S%H4891><s%> Thou hast the dew <S%H2919><s%> of thy youth <S%H3208><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath sworn <S%H7650><s%>, and will not repent <S%H5162><s%>: Thou art a priest <S%H3548><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> After the order <S%H1700><s%> of Melchizedek <S%H4442><s%>.
The Lord <S%H136><s%> at thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> Will strike <S%H4272><s%> through kings <S%H4428><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his wrath <S%H639><s%>.

He will judge <S%H1777><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, He will fill <S%H4390><s%> the places with dead bodies <S%H1472><s%>; He will strike <S%H4272><s%> through the head <S%H7218><s%> in many <S%H7227><s%> countries <S%H776><s%>.
He will drink <S%H8354><s%> of the brook <S%H5158><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>: Therefore will he lift up <S%H7311><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%>.
